function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Encouraging businesses to take on new loans or extend existing loans could increase financial vulnerability and debt burden.","Impact":"Potential increase in bankruptcies and financial instability.","Mitigation":"Provide financial education and counseling to businesses, and assess the viability of each business before providing additional financing.","Technologies":"Financial analysis tools for assessing business viability.","People":"Small businesses, households.","Owner":"Financial institutions, government agencies."},{"Description":"Simplified procedures for banking transactions could lead to increased cyber security risks.","Impact":"Potential for unauthorized access, identity theft, and financial fraud.","Mitigation":"Implement robust cyber security measures, including multi-factor authentication, encryption, and regular security assessments.","Technologies":"Biometric authentication, encryption technologies, security analytics.","People":"Bank customers, financial institutions.","Owner":"Technology and security experts, financial institutions."},{"Description":"Encouraging face-to-face transactions in branch for certain transactions could increase the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Potential for increased spread of contagious diseases, such as COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Promote online and mobile banking options, provide sanitation and safety measures in branches, and limit the number of in-person transactions.","Technologies":"Online banking platforms, mobile banking apps, sanitation and hygiene technologies.","People":"Bank customers, bank employees.","Owner":"Financial institutions, government health agencies."}]}
